comment: Very soft - mouthfeel reminds me of the St. George single malt with but with a touch more honey and cream. Big whiff of smoke on the back end.
Smoke, honey, lemon, dark chocolate milkshake topped with whipped cream, toffee nuts, toasted puffed rice, sea salt.
Soft smoke, sweetness, dessert like finish. No water.
The nose is a little peculiar, but I can’t specify what I’m smelling. Love the mouthfeel. Soft and thick. Intense, yet understated flavor profile. Well balanced malt and peet. 4.10.

Vanilla, honey, dust, life cereal, and a hint of peat smoke on the nose. Palate is dried fruit, peat, earth, caramel, and grain. Reminds me of highland Park 12, but more...American? Very interesting stuff.
